description: go-tour: more precise wording to describe &T{}

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

LGTM
 On May 6, 2013 9:49 AM, <adg@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev1,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go-**tour <https://code.google.com/p/go-tour>
>
>
> Description:
> go-tour: more precise wording to describe &T{}
>
> Please review this at https://codereview.appspot.**com/9228043/<https://codereview.appspot.com/9228043/>
>
> Affected files:
>   M tour.article
>
>
> Index: tour.article
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/tour.article
> +++ b/tour.article
> @@ -286,7 +286,7 @@
>
>  You can list just a subset of fields by using the `Name:` syntax. (And
> the order of named fields is irrelevant.)
>
> -The special prefix `&` constructs a pointer to a struct literal.
> +The special prefix `&` constructs a pointer to a newly allocated struct.
>
>  .play prog/struct-literals.go
>
>
>
> --
>
